cause.description:
From Dhaka to Chittagong, the nation of Bangladesh has suffered from a severe shortage of hors d'oeuvres since gaining independence in 1971. Recent estimates of Bangladesh's population range from 142 to 150 million, making it the 7th most populous nation in the world. Despite this, the nation ranks a disappointing 147th in hors d'oeuvre consumption.
1. The people of Bangladesh deserve the delicious hors d'oeuvres they have waited for so patiently.
cause.mission: To help end the chronic shortage of hors d'oeuvres in the nation of Bangladesh.
cause.name: Hors D'Oeuvres for Bangladesh
